title: The Subversion Is Now Out In The Open (Ep 1732)
description:
In this episode, I address the left’s “Great Reset,” and I provide hard evidence of the ideological subversion happening out in the open. 

News Picks:

A staffer on the January 6th committee was a “Russian Disinformation” hoaxer.

Sleazy Joe Biden greases up one of his big donors.


The Democrats are in real trouble in congressional swing districts. 

Another devastating report about the FBI.


The Boeing crash is baffling experts.

The dangers of micro-plastics.
